text:
W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
250 CHAMPION STREET
BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN
HORACE B. POWELL
January 11, i960
PHONE
PUBLICATIONS DIRECTOR
Miss Betty McKenzie
Publications Editor
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Miss McKenzie:
We advised our printer that you could use an inked copy of
the drawing which illustrated "NAEB Radio" and is being
carried in our forthcoming Annual Report. The printer adÂ¬
vised that they merely took the pencil drawing which you
furnished, cleaned it up and retouched it directly on their
negative. The printer has sent to us, and we are relaying to
you, gloss prints of the separated colors and these prints,
according to the printer, should be exactly what you need
for any future reproductions.
Thank you, indeed, for your cooperation. We hope that you
like the NAE3B presentation as carried in our Annual Report
which you should receive shortly after January 20.
HBP: dc
enc.
